high_descs: turn right, walk to couch, turn to face the red pillow on the left
pick up the red pillow that is on the couch
turn right, walk forward, turn left, walk to the lamp, hold red pillow up to the lamp
anns.task_desc: examine a pillow with a lamp

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the red cushion on the green couch.
Pick up the red cushion from the couch.
Walk to the tall lamp in the corner next to the boots.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the tall lamp while carrying a red cushion.

high_descs: turn to the right and go forward to the end of the coffee table and turn to the left and facing a red throw pillow on a couch
pick up the red throw pillow from the couch
turn to the right and go forward to the small table and turn to the left and step to the floor lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a red throw pillow by the light of a floor lamp
